name: Lemon Asparagus and Carrots
ingredients: 2 pounds of carrots, quartered and cut into 1/4 inch sticks about 1 1/2 inch long
1 pound of asparagus, woody stems broken off, spears cut into pieces about 1 1/2 inch long
steps: In a large deep skillet, bring 1 inch of water to a boil. Add the carrots. Reduce the heat to medium. Cover and simmer
for 4-‐6 minutes, or until crisp-‐tender. Remove the carrots with a slotted spoon to a colander.
Add the asparagus to the water in the skillet. Cover and simmer for 6 minutes or until crisp-‐tender. Pour the asparagus
In the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the lemon peel, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Return the
carrots and asparagus to the skillet. Stir for 1-‐2 minutes, or until well coated and heated through. Serve right away.
